title: PICTORIAL: Alaafin moves to ancient palace in Oyo
description: The new Alaafin of Oyo, Oba Akeem Owoade, has officially moved into the ancient palace in Oyo town nine months after his installation as the new ruler.Read More: https://punchng.com/pictorial-alaafin-moves-to-ancient-palace-in-oyo/

title: Ice World Assay: Ancient Antarctica Reveals A ‘One–two Punch’ Behind Ice Sheet Collapse - astrobiology.com
description: Ice World Assay: Ancient Antarctica Reveals A ‘One–two Punch’ Behind Ice Sheet Collapse astrobiology.comThe fate of the planet’s coastlines depends on how fast Antarctica’s ice sheets melt. title: Central Sanskrit University’s Digital Push Brings Ancient Wisdom To The World
description: On PM Modi’s birthday, Central Sanskrit University held a global Sanskrit conference at Auroville, blending ancient wisdom with digital learning, celebrating literature, and training future Sanskrit teachers, highlighting the language’s cultural and global relevance.

title: Uzbekistan Takes a Bold Step into the Global Tourism Spotlight as the Official Partner at IFTM Top Resa 2026, Showcasing Its Ancient Legacy and Modern Growth in the Heart of Central Asia
description: Uzbekistan Takes a Bold Step into the Global Tourism Spotlight as the Official Partner at IFTM Top Resa 2026, Showcasing Its Ancient Legacy and Modern Growth in the Heart of Central AsiaUzbekistan has been selected as the prestigious partner country for the IFTM Top Resa 2026, the global travel and tourism exhibition in Paris.The post Uzbekistan Takes a Bold Step into the Global Tourism Spotlight as the Official Partner at IFTM Top Resa 2026, Showcasing Its Ancient Legacy and Modern Growth in the Heart of Central Asia appeared first on Travel And Tour World.
